name: Bloom and Grow
description:
My and my group's submission to the 2023 Global Game Jam hosted at the University of Baltimore, Shady Grove Campus. This platformer puts the player in control of a small forest spirit who's objective is to bring life back to a desolate valley by way of the flowers and vines that sprout in its wake.

Our group earned third place in the game jam and plan on continuing to update this game.
